sentences.en: "I think I hear the telephone ringing."—"Okay, I can take a hint."
sentences.cn: “我想我听到电话铃在响。”——“好的，我明白你的意思了。”

sentences.en: "Orchards would take the place of the jungle," he rhapsodized.
sentences.cn: “要让这片丛林成为果园，”他无比兴奋地说。

sentences.en: "Take That" are the best group in the whole world. So there.
sentences.cn: “接招”乐队是世界上最好的组合，就是这样的。

sentences.en: a car that takes low sulphur fuel
sentences.cn: 使用低硫燃油的汽车

sentences.en: Do you take American Express?
sentences.cn: 你们接受美国运通信用卡吗？

sentences.en: He may suddenly take a dislike to foods that he's previously enjoyed.
sentences.cn: 对以前爱吃的食物，他兴许突然就没了胃口。

sentences.en: he might take some convincing.
sentences.cn: 他可能需要费事找一些更令人信服的证据。

sentences.en: I just can’t take any more (= can’t deal with a bad situation any longer ) .
sentences.cn: 我再也受不了了。

sentences.en: If you take my advice , you’ll see a doctor.
sentences.cn: 如果你听我的意见，就去看医生。

sentences.en: It would take three to six hours for a round trip.
sentences.cn: 往返行程需要3到6个小时。

sentences.en: Let's take a look at some of the figures involved.
sentences.cn: 让我们看一下涉及的一些数字。

sentences.en: Liz found his criticisms hard to take .
sentences.cn: 利兹觉得他的批评很难接受。

sentences.en: Mitchel's schedule had not permitted him to take time off.
sentences.cn: 米切尔的日程安排使他无法休假。

sentences.en: My job has taken me all over the world.
sentences.cn: 我的工作让我走遍了世界各地。

sentences.en: My personal life has had to take second place to my career.
sentences.cn: 我的私人生活不得不让位于事业。

sentences.en: Our helpline take s 3.5 million calls (= telephone calls ) a year.
sentences.cn: 我们的求助热线每年接听350万个电话。

sentences.en: Remember, stick to the issues and don't take it personally.
sentences.cn: 记住，就事论事，不要把问题个人化。

sentences.en: See our selection of autumn favourites and take your pick.
sentences.cn: 看看我们的秋季精选，然后挑出你想要的。

sentences.en: She did not take kindly to being offered advice.
sentences.cn: 她不喜欢别人给她提建议。

sentences.en: Some doctors are unwilling to take new patients without a referral.
sentences.cn: 有些医生不愿意接收没有转诊单的新病人。

sentences.en: Staff have agreed to take a 2% pay cut.
sentences.cn: 员工同意接受2%的降薪。

sentences.en: Take a hundred and twenty values and calculate the mean.
sentences.cn: 取120个值计算平均数。

sentences.en: take it from me, kid—I've been there, done it, seen it all.
sentences.cn: 小家伙，我向你保证——我一直在那里，做了这件事情，并且看见了一切。

sentences.en: Take the patient’s pulse first.
sentences.cn: 先测一下病人的脉搏。

sentences.en: The elevator takes a maximum of 32 people.
sentences.cn: 这电梯最多可以乘32人。

sentences.en: The road divides; you should take the right fork.
sentences.cn: 路在这里分了岔；你应该走右边一条。

sentences.en: Well, I'll take your word for it then, love.
sentences.cn: 唔，那我就信你吧，亲爱的。

sentences.en: What size shoe do you take?
sentences.cn: 你穿多大尺码的鞋子？

sentences.en: When he refused to give his name, he was taken into custody.
sentences.cn: 他拒绝说出自己的名字，于是就被拘留了。

sentences.en: Will you take the job?
sentences.cn: 你接受这份工作吗？

sentences.en: Would you mind taking Susie home ?
sentences.cn: 请你带苏茜回家好吗？

sentences.en: You have to take capital appreciation of the property into account.
sentences.cn: 你必须将该处房产的资本增值考虑在内。

words.tran_cn: 可爱的；迷人的；会传染的
接受者；接受打赌的人；捕获者

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)具备成功所需的基本条件

phrases.phrase: take advantage of (或 take advice etc.)

phrases.tran_cn: 接受；理解；拘留；欺骗；让…进入；改短
承担；呈现；具有；流行；接纳；雇用；穿上
v. 取出；去掉；出发；抵充
(非正式)（人，事情）最出色的；最愚蠢的

trans.tran_cn: 拿，取，携带，移开，夺取，吃，喝，写下，拍照，接受
trans.tran_en: to move or go with someone or something from one place to another
